channel.title: Requesting A Sleek Background
channel.description:
My current dsktop background is really boring. I really want something like this: -
- High resolution - Black with lighting colored fire/bolts - Really cool game character/s - Digital Blasphemy
I'm looking for something along the lines of -
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img77.imageshack.us/img77/9813/somethingblue1ak.jpg[/img][/URL]
Well, that kinda color and background color. But not the giant ball of tentacles in the middle :)
